requirement.en: Place 1 face-up monster from your field on the bottom of the owner's Deck.

effect.en: Add 1 LIGHT Attribute Machine Type monster with 800 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, if you have "Power Capsule Red" in your Graveyard, you can Fusion Summon a Level 4 Machine Type monster with 800 DEF by sending monsters from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard as material.
